title: Chipotle, Microsoft, Caterpillar, and Other Stocks for Investors to Watch This Week
text:
Third-quarter earnings season is in full swing, with 122 S&P 500 components releasing results this week. Halliburton kicks off the week on Monday, followed by a packed Tuesday: Chipotle Mexican Grill, Lockheed Martin, McDonald’s, Procter & Gamble, United Parcel Service, and United Technologies all report. Wednesday’s highlights include Microsoft, Boeing, Caterpillar, eBay, Ford Motor, and PayPal Holdings. Amazon.com headlines Thursday’s earnings, along with American Airlines Group, Comcast, Intel, Twitter, and Visa. Finally, Friday brings results from Verizon Communications and Anheuser-Busch InBev.

The...
description: Third-quarter earnings season is in full swing, with 122 S&P 500 components releasing results this week. The economic data highlight will be Thursday’s September durable goods orders, a decent proxy for business investment.
